pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'HydroPortail' Statistical Functions // Statistical functions used in the French 'HydroPortail' https://hydro.eaufrance.fr/. This includes functions to estimate distributions, quantile curves and uncertainties, along with various other utilities. Technical details are available (in French) in Renard (2016) https://hal.inrae.fr/hal-02605318.
